text:
Has anyone used a React module with an email template?
I can drag and drop the modules into the email but they do not render anything

Hello everyone. There are several problems, namely:
1. The `--generateFieldsTypes` flag does not work, it does not give errors in the console, it simply does not generate type files.
2. If you remove the `--resetSession` flag, it gives the error "Session token is invalid"
3. If any "project" is present on the account, then subsequent deployments break the selection of templates for pages. That is:
• If there were no projects and you make a deployment, everything is ok, it works.
• If you make a deployment of the same\any project, the modules are updated, but when you select a template in the page settings, they disappear, and it says that there are no templates, although at the moment 1 template is already in use and I can add modules to it.
4. For some reason, the Page Proxy does not work. I turn on "Open Local Dev Server", the circle lights up yellow. In the console when the local server is running it says "`Proxying request to <path>`", when I make changes in the module it says "`Skipping <path> due to unsupported extension`"
`package.json`
```{
  "name": "app",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "type": "module",
  "dependencies": {
    "<@UDA553DRD>/cms-components": "latest",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.14",
    "postcss-nested": "^6.0.1",
    "prop-types": "^15.8.1",
    "react": "^18.1.0",
    "react-dom": "^18.1.0",
    "tailwindcss": "^3.4.16"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@eslint/js": "^8.56.0",
    "<@UDA553DRD>/cms-dev-server": "latest",
    "@types/node": "^20.11.0",
    "@types/react": "^18.2.55",
    "@types/react-dom": "^18.2.19",
    "@types/tailwindcss": "^3.1.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^6.21.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^6.21.0",
    "@vitejs/plugin-react": "^2.1.0",
    "eslint": "^8.56.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^9.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^5.2.1",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.33.2",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^4.6.0",
    "eslint-plugin-unused-imports": "^4.1.4",
    "jsdom": "^20.0.1",
    "prettier": "^3.4.2",
    "typescript": "5.3.3",
    "vite": "^3.2.11",
    "vitest": "^0.24.3"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "start": "hs-cms-dev-server . --resetSession --generateFieldsTypes",
    "test": "vitest",
    "lint": "eslint . --cache",
    "lint:fix": "eslint . --fix --cache",
    "format": "prettier --write \"**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json,css,scss,md}\""
  }
}```
